description: Organize and recall important context across projects. Save key details, retrieve them instantly, and remove outdated or irrelevant entries. Keep your workspace tidy with selective or bulk cleanup.

capabilities.name: remember_memory
capabilities.description: Stores a memory with optional tags in a specified category

capabilities.name: retrieve_memories
capabilities.description: Retrieves all memories from a specified category

capabilities.name: remove_memory_category
capabilities.description: Removes all memories within a specified category

capabilities.name: remove_specific_memory
capabilities.description: Removes a specific memory within a specified category
